verses.t: Behold{G1492}, what manner of{G4217} love{G26} the Father{G3588} hath bestowed{G1325} upon us{G2254}, that{G2443} we should be called{G2564} the sons{G5043} of God{G2316}: therefore{G1223} the world{G3588} knoweth{G1097} us{G2248} not{G3756}, because{G3754} it knew{G1097} him{G846} not{G3756}.

Beloved{G27}, now{G3568} are we{G2070} the sons{G5043} of God{G2316}, and{G2532} it doth{G5319} not yet{G3768} appear{G5319} what{G5101} we shall be{G2071}: but{G1161} we know{G1492} that{G3754}, when{G1437} he shall appear{G5319}, we shall be{G2071} like{G3664} him{G846}; for{G3754} we shall see{G3700} him{G846} as{G2531} he is{G2076}.
And{G2532} every man{G3956} that hath{G2192} this{G3778} hope{G3588} in{G1909} him{G846} purifieth{G48} himself{G1438}, even as{G2531} he{G1565} is{G2076} pure{G53}.
Whosoever{G3956} committeth{G4160} sin{G3588} transgresseth{G4160} also{G2532} the law{G3588}: for{G2532} sin{G3588} is{G2076} the transgression of the law{G3588}.
And{G2532} ye know{G1492} that{G3754} he{G1565} was manifested{G5319} to{G2443} take away{G142} our{G2257} sins{G3588}; and{G2532} in{G1722} him{G846} is{G2076} no{G3756} sin{G266}.
Whosoever{G3956} abideth{G3306} in{G1722} him{G846} sinneth{G264} not{G3756}: whosoever{G3956} sinneth{G264} hath{G3708} not{G3756} seen{G3708} him{G846}, neither{G3761} known{G1097} him{G846}.
Little children{G5040}, let{G4105} no man{G3367} deceive{G4105} you{G5209}: he that doeth{G4160} righteousness{G3588} is{G2076} righteous{G1342}, even as{G2531} he{G1565} is{G2076} righteous{G1342}.

He that committeth{G4160} sin{G3588} is{G2076} of{G1537} the devil{G1228}; for{G3754} the devil{G1228} sinneth{G264} from{G575} the beginning{G746}. For{G1519} this purpose{G5124} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588} was manifested{G5319}, that{G2443} he might destroy{G3089} the works{G3588} of the devil{G1228}.

Whosoever{G3956} is born{G1080} of{G1537} God{G3588} doth{G4160} not{G3756} commit{G4160} sin{G266}; for{G3754} his{G846} seed{G4690} remaineth{G3306} in{G1722} him{G846}: and{G2532} he cannot{G1410} sin{G264}, because{G3754} he is born{G1080} of{G1537} God{G3588}.Not sure about tags for "ou dunatai."

In{G1722} this{G5129} the children{G3588} of God{G3588} are{G2076} manifest{G5318}, and{G2532} the children{G3588} of the devil{G1228}: whosoever{G3956} doeth{G4160} not{G3361} righteousness{G1343} is{G2076} not{G3756} of{G1537} God{G3588}, neither{G2532} he that loveth{G25} not{G3361} his{G846} brother{G3588}.
For{G3754} this{G3778} is{G2076} the message{G3588} that{G3739} ye heard{G191} from{G575} the beginning{G746}, that{G2443} we should love{G25} one another{G240}.

Not{G3756} as{G2531} Cain{G2535}, who was{G2258} of{G1537} that wicked one{G4190}, and{G2532} slew{G4969} his{G846} brother{G3588}. And{G2532} wherefore{G5484} slew he{G4969} him{G846}? Because{G3754} his own{G846} works{G3588} were{G2258} evil{G4190}, and{G1161} his{G846} brother's{G3588} righteous{G1342}.
Marvel{G2296} not{G3361}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, if{G1487} the world{G3588} hate{G3404} you{G5209}.

We{G2249} know{G1492} that{G3754} we have passed{G3327} from{G1537} death{G3588} unto{G1519} life{G3588}, because{G3754} we love{G25} the brethren{G3588}. He that loveth{G25} not{G3361} his brother{G3588} abideth{G3306} in{G1722} death{G3588}.

Whosoever{G3956} hateth{G3404} his{G846} brother{G3588} is{G2076} a murderer{G443}: and{G2532} ye know{G1492} that{G3754} no{G3756} murderer{G443} hath{G2192} eternal{G166} life{G2222} abiding{G3306} in{G1722} him{G846}.Not sure about tag for pas.

Hereby{G1722} perceive we{G1097} the love{G3588} of God{G3588}, because{G3754} he{G1565} laid down{G5087} his{G846} life{G3588} for{G5228} us{G2257}: and{G2532} we{G2249} ought{G3784} to lay down{G5087} our lives{G3588} for{G5228} the brethren{G3588}.

But{G1161} whoso{G3739}hath{G2192} this world's{G3588} good{G3588}, and{G2532} seeth{G2334} his{G846} brother{G3588} have{G2192} need{G5532}, and{G2532} shutteth up{G2808} his{G846} bowels{G3588} of compassion from{G575} him{G846}, how{G4459} dwelleth{G3306} the love{G3588} of God{G3588} in{G1722} him{G846}?"Whoso" translates two greek words. You might want to check the tags.
My{G3450} little children{G5040}, let us{G25} not{G3361} love{G25} in word{G3056}, neither{G3366} in tongue{G1100}; but{G235} in deed{G2041} and{G2532} in truth{G225}.

And{G2532} hereby{G1722} we know{G1097} that{G3754} we are{G2070} of{G1537} the truth{G3588}, and{G2532} shall assure{G3982} our{G2257} hearts{G3588} before{G1715} him{G846}."Hereby" translates two Greek words.

For{G3754} if{G1437} our{G2257} heart{G3588} condemn us{G2607}, God{G3588} is{G2076} greater than{G3187} our{G2257} heart{G3588}, and{G2532} knoweth{G1097} all things{G3956}.The second "hoti" is not translated. I went aheadd and placed the tag after "heart."
Beloved{G27}, if{G1437} our{G2257} heart{G3588} condemn{G2607} us{G2257} not{G3361}, then have we{G2192} confidence{G3954} toward{G4314} God{G3588}.

And{G2532} whatsoever{G3739} we ask{G154}, we receive{G2983} of{G3844} him{G846}, because{G3754} we keep{G5083} his{G846} commandments{G3588}, and{G2532} do{G4160} those things that are pleasing{G701} in{G1799} his{G846} sight{G1799}."Whatsoever" translates 2 Greek words. You might want to check the tags.

And{G2532} this{G3778} is{G2076} his{G846} commandment{G3588}, That{G2443} we should believe{G4100} on the name{G3588} of his{G846} Son{G3588} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G2532} love{G25} one another{G240}, as{G2531} he gave{G1325} us{G2254} commandment{G1785}."huiou autou" is translated "of his son." I could have split the tag for "huiou," but I chose instead to have the tag for "autou" enclose "of his."

And{G2532} he that keepeth{G5083} his{G846} commandments{G3588} dwelleth{G3306} in{G1722} him{G846}, and{G2532} he{G846} in{G1722} him{G846}. And{G2532} hereby{G1722} we know{G1097} that{G3754} he abideth{G3306} in{G1722} us{G2254}, by{G1537} the Spirit{G3588} which{G3739} he hath given{G1325} us{G2254}.
